actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to powers reserved to the several States.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides that each State shall have exclusive jurisdiction of the organization and administration of all public schools and public school systems within the State. Directs that the courts of each State shall have exclusive jurisdiction to determine all rights, privileges, and immunities of citizens of the State with respect to public schools and public school systems within the State.

titles.title: A resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States relating to powers reserved to the several States.
